data.text: Jisas takaw anɨb ak agjuwɨl, kɨlan gɨl nɨŋɨd agak, Bapi, ñɨn aglɨnak ak mɨñɨl owup agak. Nad Ñɨnak nop ge yɨb awl dɨnɨmuŋ agak. Anɨge, Ñɨnak ak nep gek yɨb awl dɨnɨgaban agak.

17.2 Dan 7.14, Mat 11.27, Jon 6.37, 1 Ko 15.25-27, Plp 2.10, Hib 2.8 Pen nop agle, binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop kod yek agak. Binɨb nop ñɨnak okok, kɨlop gek pel pelnep yenɨgel agak. Anɨb ak nɨm, nop agle, binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop kod yek agak.

17.3 Ais 53.11, Jon 5.36-37, 1 Ko 8.4, 1 Te 1.9, 1 Jo 5.20 Pen pel pelnep mɨdebal anɨgɨl mɨdeb agak. Bɨ pel mɨdep dɨpal okok, kɨli nad nokom God nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdeban ak nɨŋɨd, Jisas Klays nop agyokɨnak ak nɨŋɨd gɨpal agak.
17.4 Jon 4.34, 13.31, 14.13, 14.31, 15.10 Yad nep gen yɨb awl dɨnɨmɨn agɨl, yɨp wog agɨnak ak, gɨ dad amɨl gɨjupin agak.
17.5 Jon 1.1-2, 17.24, Plp 2.6, Kol 1.15-17, Hib 1.3, 1.10 Mɨñɨl ge yɨb awl denɨm, man ma alwol gɨlɨlok ñɨn ak, omɨŋal gɨl Bɨawl yɨb yɨlok tek yonɨgul agak.

Bɨ lum awl mɨdebal yɨp agɨnak okok, mɨñɨl bɨyad mɨdebal ak, nad bɨ tay tek mɨseŋ nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, kɨlop agñɨtep gɨnek agak. Nak yɨl yelak ak pen, yɨp agɨnak nɨm, bɨyad mɨdɨl, takaw nad ak dɨl kɨdek gɨpal agak.
Pen mɨñɨl nepal, tap tɨtay yɨp ñɨban ak, ke nep ma dɨpin agak. Yɨp ñɨban adek ak nep dɨpin agak.
17.8 Jon 8.28, 12.49, 14.10, 16.27, 16.30 Takaw yɨp agñɨnak okok, bɨyad okok kɨlop agñen dɨlak agak. Agñen dɨl nɨgɨlak ak nɨm, nad yɨp agyoke nad ayɨp mɨdɨl ownek ak, nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨlak agak.
Bɨ yɨp agɨnak anɨb okok, bɨ nad mɨdebal tek, kɨlop kod yenɨmɨn agɨl, nep agnɨgebin agak. Binɨb lum awl okok kɨlop kod yenɨmɨn agɨl, nep ma agnɨgebin agak.
17.10 Jon 16.15 Bɨyad okok, bɨ nad mɨdebal agak. Pen bɨ nad okok, bɨyad mɨdebal agak. Pen binɨb yokɨp okok kɨli bɨ chɨlapɨl okok kɨlop nɨgel, yɨb awl dɨpin agak.

17.11 Jon 10.30, 13.1, 17.21, 1 Pi 1.5, Jud 1 Nad mɨdeban ak nɨnɨgebin agak. Yad lum awl pel ma yenɨgayn, bɨyad pen kɨli lum awl yenɨgabal agak. Bapi, nad bɨ suŋtep yɨbɨl mɨdeban agak. Nad bɨawl yɨb awl mɨdeban tek, yɨp age abe mɨdebin agak. Nad yɨb awl mɨdeban anɨb ak, kɨlop kod yenɨmɨn, chɨlapɨl bɨ nokom tek lup ak tek, kɨli abe jɨj nokom jɨmñɨl yenɨgel agak.

17.12 Sng 41.9, 109.8, Jon 6.39, 13.18, 18.9, Apo 1.20, Hib 2.13, 1 Jo 2.19 Nad bɨawl yɨb awl mɨdeban tek, yɨp age abe mɨdebin agak. Anɨb ak tek, ñɨn ak yad kɨli ayɨp nep mɨdɨl, kɨlop kod mɨdtep yesɨpin agak. Kod mɨdtep gen, olap ma kul gup agak. Bɨ ne kul gep tek anep, buk Baybol gɨnɨgab agɨl tɨkɨlak tek nep kul gɨnɨgab agak.

Pen mɨdeban ak nɨnɨgebin tek, mɨñɨl bɨyad okok kɨli nɨg yelaknɨŋ, nep takaw anɨb awl agebin agak. Lum awl mɨdɨl agebin anɨb ak nɨgel, yɨp tep yɨbɨl geb tek, kɨlop abe tep yɨbɨl gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl agebin agak.

17.14 Jon 8.23, 15.18-19, 17.16, 1 Jo 3.13 Yad takaw nad ak bɨyad okok kɨlop agñɨbin tek, binɨb lum awl okok kɨli, kɨlop mɨlɨk nepal agak. Yad bɨ lum awl olap ma mɨdebin tek, bɨyad okok kɨli abe mɨdebal anɨb ak tek, kɨlop mɨlɨk nepal agak.
17.15 Mat 6.13, Gal 1.4, 2 Te 3.3, 1 Jo 5.18 Pen kɨlop dad ame, lum awl kelɨgɨl amnɨlaŋ agɨl ma agebin agak. Kɨlop lum awl kod yenɨmɨn, bɨ tɨmel ak kɨlop gɨ tɨmel ma gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl agebin agak.
Yad bɨ lum awl olap ma mɨdebin tek, bɨyad okok kɨli abe mɨdebal agak.
17.17 Sng 119.142, Apo 15.9, Epe 5.26, 1 Pi 1.22 Takaw nad ak nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak. Anɨb ak takaw nad ak age, kɨlop gek bɨ nad mɨdɨl, nep malɨk mɨñ gɨnɨgel agak.
17.18 Jon 20.21 Yɨp agyoke binɨb lum awl yɨl ownek tek, bɨyad okok kɨlop agyoken binɨb lum awl yɨl abal agak.
17.19 1 Ko 1.2, 1.30, 1 Te 4.7, Hib 10.10 Yad bɨ malɨk nad yɨbɨl mɨdebin tek, kɨlop gos nɨŋɨd gen, kɨli abe bɨ malɨk nad yɨbɨl okok pɨsnep yenɨgel agak.
Pen bɨyad anɨb okok kɨlop nep ma agnɨgebin agak. Kɨli takaw agñel, binɨb nɨŋɨd yɨp gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgabal okok kɨlop abe agnɨgebin agak.

17.21 Jon 10.16, 10.38, 17.11, Lom 12.5, Gal 3.28 Chɨlapɨl keke mel, bɨ nokom yɨbɨl mɨdobul tek, binɨb yɨp gos lɨnepal okok, mɨdupsek jɨmñɨl anɨb ak tek yenɨgel agak. Anɨb ak tek kɨli chɨl ayɨp jɨmñɨl mɨdel, binɨb yokɨp okok nɨŋɨd, nad nokom yɨp agyoke ownek ak nɨgɨnɨgel agak.
17.22 Jon 14.20, Apo 4.32, 1 Jo 1.3, 3.24 Yɨb awl yɨp ñɨban ak, yad pen kɨlop ñɨbin anɨb ak tek, chɨl jɨmñɨl mɨdobul tek kɨli anɨb ak nep yenɨgel agak.

17.23 Kol 3.14 Yad kɨli ayɨp nep mɨdebin, nad yad ayɨp nep mɨdeban anɨb ak tek, kɨli jɨmñɨl mɨdtep gɨnɨgel agak. Jɨmñɨl mɨdelaknɨŋ, binɨb lum awl yɨl nɨgɨnɨgel, nad yɨp agyoke ownek agak. Pen abe nɨgɨnɨgel, yɨp mapen lɨpan nep tek, binɨb yad okok kɨlop mapen lɨpan agak.

Bapi, binɨb yɨp agɨnak okok, yad akal mɨdebin ak kɨli ayɨp nep yonɨgun agɨl nɨgebin agak. Ayɨp mɨdon, bɨawl yɨbɨl yɨb awl yonɨmuŋ agɨl yɨp ñɨnak tek yeneknɨŋ, yɨp nɨgɨnɨgel agak. Man ma alwol gɨlak ñɨn ak, yɨp mapen lɨnak anɨb ak tek, bɨawl yɨbɨl yɨb awl yonɨmuŋ agɨl yɨp ñɨnak agak.
17.25 Jon 8.55, 15.21, 16.3, 16.27 Bapi, nad nɨm bɨ tep yɨbɨl gep agak. Binɨb lum awl yɨl okok nep ma nepal, yad pen nep nepin agak. Pen binɨb yad okol, nad yɨp agyoke ownek ak nepal agak.

17.26 Jon 15.9, 15.15, 17.6 Nad yɨp mapen lɨpan tek nɨgtep gɨnɨgel, binɨb okok kɨlop anɨgɨnɨgel agɨl gos nepin agak. Pen yad abe kɨli ayɨp yenɨm agak. Anɨb ak nɨm, nep bɨ tay tek ak kɨlop yobin agak. Pen anɨgɨl pel yomnɨgayn agak.
